node.name: PowerShell Junkie
node.shortdescription:
PowerShell Junkie adds PowerShell support to the Eclipse IDE. It supports:


  1. Integration of PowerShell scripts into the workbench.
  2. Dynamic script loading.
  3. Configurable script paths and scan intervals.
  4. "Open PowerShell here..." functionality within explorer and navigator views.

Requires Eclipse 3.3, Java 5, and Microsoft operating system.
node.body:
PowerShell Junkie adds PowerShell support to the Eclipse IDE. It supports:


  1. Integration of PowerShell scripts into the workbench.
  2. Dynamic script loading.
  3. Configurable script paths and scan intervals.
  4. "Open PowerShell here..." functionality within explorer and navigator views.

Requires Eclipse 3.3, Java 5, and Microsoft operating system.
